name: Marvelous Murgos Carnival of Wonders and Delights
name_original: Marvelous Murgos Carnival of Wonders and Delights
description:
A simple memory match game with a combo system twist! Get matches using fortune telling cards and earn tickets to unlock prizes to decorate the play table. As a bonus you also get a fortune reading once you match them all!
Can be played on 4 difficulty levels. Do you dare try Extreme?

Made for a college VR project over the course of a few weeks.

Designer - Alexander McGarrity

Programmer - Dylan Shorten

Artists
- Eva Ko
-Aiden Thiele
-Jessica Knight
-Koby Francalanza
